import React from 'react' import { Card, CardActions, CardContent, CardMedia, Button, Typography} from '@material-ui/core'; import ThumbUpAltIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ThumbUpAlt'; import DeleteIcon from '@material-ui/icons/Delete'; import MoreHorizIcon from '@material-ui/icons/MoreHoriz' import useStyles from './styles' import moment from 'moment' const Post = ({ post, setCurrentId }) => { const classes = useStyles() return (
{post.creator} {moment(post.createdAt).fromNow()}
{post.tags.map(tag => {return tag.forEach(tags => `#${tag}`)})} {console.log(post.tags)}
{post.message} ) } export default Post
